mapper.select: select USERID, OPER, CORPID, EBAYIDENTIFY, OPERFLAG, OPERTIME, ORDERSTATUS, UPDATEFLAG, TOKEN, SHIPPERADDRESS, SHIPPERADDRESSTYPE, APPKEY, SHIPPERNAME, SHIPPEREMAIL, SHIPPERZIPCODE, SHIPPERPHONE, SHIPPERCOMPANYNAME from db_sfcuser where USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select USERID, OPER, CORPID, EBAYIDENTIFY, OPERFLAG, OPERTIME, ORDERSTATUS, UPDATEFLAG, TOKEN, SHIPPERADDRESS, SHIPPERADDRESSTYPE, APPKEY, SHIPPERNAME, SHIPPEREMAIL, SHIPPERZIPCODE, SHIPPERPHONE, SHIPPERCOMPANYNAME from db_sfcuser
mapper.sql: USERID , OPER , CORPID , EBAYIDENTIFY , OPERFLAG , OPERTIME , ORDERSTATUS , UPDATEFLAG , TOKEN , SHIPPERADDRESS , SHIPPERADDRESSTYPE , APPKEY , SHIPPERNAME , SHIPPEREMAIL , SHIPPERZIPCODE , SHIPPERPHONE , SHIPPERCOMPANYNAME

USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EBAYIDENTIFY = #{ebayidentify,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OPERFLAG = #{operflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
ORDERSTATUS = #{orderstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
UPDATEFLAG = #{updateflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
TOKEN = #{token,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
SHIPPERADDRESS = #{shipperaddress,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
SHIPPERADDRESSTYPE = #{shipperaddresstype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
APPKEY = #{appkey,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
SHIPPERNAME = #{shippername,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
SHIPPEREMAIL = #{shipperemail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
SHIPPERZIPCODE = #{shipperzipcode,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
SHIPPERPHONE = #{shipperphone,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
SHIPPERCOMPANYNAME = #{shippercompanyname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1

USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
EBAYIDENTIFY = #{ebayidentify,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
OPERFLAG = #{operflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
ORDERSTATUS = #{orderstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
UPDATEFLAG = #{updateflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
TOKEN = #{token,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
SHIPPERADDRESS = #{shipperaddress,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
SHIPPERADDRESSTYPE = #{shipperaddresstype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
APPKEY = #{appkey,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
SHIPPERNAME = #{shippername,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
SHIPPEREMAIL = #{shipperemail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
SHIPPERZIPCODE = #{shipperzipcode,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
SHIPPERPHONE = #{shipperphone,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
SHIPPERCOMPANYNAME = #{shippercompanyname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
, 1=1
